title: Missing Talon Skin?
body:
Hi there Riot,
I previously bought SSW Talon while it was out awhile ago and just now I went to play Talon and the skin isn't there. I re-loaded my shop, exited client and restarted it, and all my other skins are there but not the SSW Talon. I don't know what is going on.
Please help me,
BrawlicSnake

replies.body: I took a look at your account and still see SSW Talon there. Can you try [running a repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq5) and see if he shows up afterwards?
Can I remove riot graves from my 2nd account that I barely play and add it to this account?
